comments.body: Can we inline this into `TestingServer` or move it into `RangeReplace`? The reason we have `TestHovers` is because we share a few utilities with the `cross` tests, which is not the case with `documentHighlight`.
I put them in a different projects since I changed another class to use RangeReplace, which is in a separate project entirely. Moving TestHighlights doesn't seem necessary.
